summary:
Awesome supplement store. For your post workout or pre workout needs or just your daily needs. Friendly staff and very knowledgeable. Also don’t forget to try their smoothie bar, their protein ice cream 🍨 is delicious 😋 - J. Tovar

 The wife and I have been going to TF for several years. Always have what we need and they carry top quality products. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable. Don’t forget to pop in for some protein ice cream it’s worth it!! - Kevin

 Stopped in to get a smoothie after my workout. Chris and his guys were attentive and efficient. Even had a few minutes to check out their amazing selection of supplements. Will definitely stop back in when I need to restock! - B. Lee
